column5: Thanks Mike, I just did a quick count I think I made 13 or 14 reports this season so far. all of them but one or two I didn't catch fish but my friends did lol. I love making fishing reports and uploading photos. When I press that preview button all the memories from that day or trip come back to me and the bast part is there all saved on file.  Thanks for your post, can't wait to see another MTP report in the near future! MTBF

Post Number 2000  I want to say thank you OFC for all the great information I have learned from this truly respectful and friendly forum. I have caught my first carp, gar pike, pike, salmon, and a bunch of personal best catches since I joined in 2008. All of the guys and gals on here deserve a pat on the back for the hard work and effort that goes into this web site. Living in Oshawa I only really had two fishing buddys and that was my friends Dad, and my papa, realizing how fun fishing is I too try to get people into the great port like my own Dad and my little brother, cousin and another friend of mine. Since then I have fished with 3 other guys from OFC and have made some great friendships.  Bringing people together, sharing information, and getting praise and appreciation from reports is something that I admire most from the members on this site. There is nothing like getting a photo of a great fish and being able to show it to hundreds of fisherman. Also, a very special thank you to the moderators on the forum!  Thanks OFC, 2000 post's down and many more to come! MTBF
Stop bragging about your post counts ...    now Wayne or GCD please come out and shut him down  Congrats! ... Oh and stop checking OFC and get some work done
lol...Congrats on your 2000 post acheivement!  ...and great speech by the way!
Thanks for the Kudo's .. congrats!
What's a post count?
LOL...you're just sitting there looking at the big number 2000 aren't ya?!  Don't wanna post cuz all those zeroes look sooooo purty!
I was thinking the same thing
you clearly dont do enough fishing
Haha, nice man.. I was sitting in a lecture yesterday with Mike, and all he could talk about was fishing, and I think he mentioned something about his post count on here
Nice story.....
Congrats and nice sermon Mike.  I want to be just like you when (if) I grow up!
It's to help figure out how long a fence is!

Thanks Ryan, now they all know what I talk about at school lool  As for fishing Mr Worm dangler I do lot's of fishing   Up to 58 times out this year!!  And as for school I scored a 88% on my Ecosystems test today so with fishing, fishing, and more fishing I still have time for homework and study time!  Uhoh...that pretty 2000 is now gone, be prepared for the 3000mark speech from Mike The BEST Fisher!
Something the software does for ya when ya run out of fingers and toes.  JF
and in GCD's case empty bottles

Thank YOU , Mike, for the encouragement and support that you learned here and have passed my way and other newbies to this board.  Don't worry about the guys jabbing ya about not studying.....WE are just jealous and wish we were back in school AND fishing  instead of DRINKING OUR BRAINS OUT while we were there
That was a very nice thank you and reminder of what this place can be  WTG on your first 2000
Mike i think ya still have a little bit of brown stuff on your nose...
You count how many times you fish....HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!

I did it last year also...every time I went out fishing I would add a day to my msn status...kinda easy, it's only counting by 1's u should try it...Kind of similar to your average fish size...the 1lb wonders  MTBF

Congrats Mike, your infectious enthusiasm is a welcome change to the many sarcastic and negative opinioned posts that sometimes make me wonder why I come here. And you actually go fishing and post reports (w/pics) unlike many who seem to be here to put down others. I'm sure you will recruit many other anglers to our chosen sport and never be short of a fishing partner.
wow.... I guess we were all rookies at one point or another! LOL..  For memories sake could you post the picture of the Muskie on the stringer for me? LOL!  congrats on 2K  G

Lol, ya what a entry eh. Was fishing for what I thought were Pike at the time and well...u remember. Didn't know anything about handling and i found out how to properly handle fish. As said, I learned LOTS here and now respect the fishery a lot more.  btw, thanks for the comment on my profile when I first joined up
anytime...  Figured you assimilate sooner or later LOL!  again congrats on 2k...
Congrats man .I do enjoy your reports young man.You have done well this year I really liked your report about the big bass you caught.  MTP
